description: [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266) can obtain passwords stored in files from web browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer, and Microsoft Edge, sometimes using [esentutl](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0404).(Citation: Trend Micro Trickbot Nov 2018)(Citation: Cyberreason Anchor December 2019)(Citation: Bitdefender Trickbot VNC module Whitepaper 2021)

external_references.description: Anthony, N., Pascual, C.. (2018, November 1). Trickbot Shows Off New Trick: Password Grabber Module. Retrieved November 16, 2018.

Radu Tudorica. (2021, July 12). A Fresh Look at Trickbotâ€™s Ever-Improving VNC Module. Retrieved September 28, 2021.
